title: Heritage carrots, goats’ curd, oats and hazelnuts
description: Carrots get the star treatment in this autumnal dish that's bursting with flavour and crunch.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz blanched hazelnuts, roughly chopped, plus 4 hazelnuts, grated, for garnish
1 bunch orange heritage carrots, leaves reserved
300g/11oz goats’ curd, mixed with a little milk
